title: A Practical DSA Roadmap for Product Interviews
excerpt: Focus on patterns, not just problems. Here’s how to drill efficiently.
html: Start with core patterns like two pointers, sliding window, hashing, and recursion. Practice via sets of escalating difficulty and conduct timed mocks.

title: Spring Boot API Launch Checklist
excerpt: Before you ship your API, run through this quick checklist.
html:
• Profiles and config
  • Validation and error handling
  • Auth, rate limiting
  • Logging & metrics

title: 10 React Questions You Must Master
excerpt: From hooks to reconciliation—be ready to explain the internals.
html:
1. Explain useEffect vs useLayoutEffect
  2. Keys and reconciliation
  3. Context vs Redux
